name: Pizza Tower Matu Build (WIP)
description:
Pizza Tower engine (WIP) built with Construct 3.

This is currently in development. This is a test level, you can't actually complete the level (yet).

I thank the fandom site for providing me with almost all sprites. I made the ground myself.

Controls are in game.

(Note: I have not added the dash, taunts, and any other of the main controls yet, you can only walk and jump, like I said, this is a WIP.)
